013package org.apache.juneau.utils;
014
015/**
016 * Identical to {@link Runnable} but the run method can throw stuff.
017 *
018 * <p>
019 * Allows you to pass in arbitrary snippets of code in fluent interfaces.
020 *
021 * <p>
022 * See <c>Assertions.<jsm>assertThrown</jsm>(Snippet)</c> for an example.
023 *
024 * <ul class='seealso'>
025 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-assertions.ja.Overview">Fluent Assertions</a>
026 * </ul>
027 */
028public interface Snippet {
029
030   /**
031    * Run arbitrary code and optionally throw an exception.
032    *
033    * @throws Throwable Any throwable.
034    */
035   void run() throws Throwable;
036}
